headline: Astro Glass
tagline: A modern Astro template with astro-glass design
chooseStyleDesc: 6 unique theme variations, each with its own personality. Click to explore the full demo.

showcase.title: One Template. Infinite Possibilities.
showcase.desc: Every section, component, and page you need — designed, coded, and ready to deploy.
showcase.themesDesc: Liquid, Glass, Neo, Luxury, Minimal & Aurora — 6 fully designed demo pages ready to go.
showcase.componentsDesc: Hero, About, Features, Pricing, Testimonial, FAQ, CTA, Contact & more.
showcase.blogDesc: MDX-powered with categories, tags, reading time, and syntax highlighting.
showcase.i18nDesc: Built-in multi-language routing, locale detection, and translation management.
showcase.docsDesc: Full docs system with sidebar navigation, search, and code examples.
showcase.edgeDesc: Cloudflare-ready with adapter config, SSR support, and global CDN.
showcase.seoDesc: Semantic HTML, meta tags, Open Graph, structured data, and sitemap built in.
showcase.perfDesc: 100 Lighthouse score with zero-JS by default, lazy loading, and optimized assets.
showcase.colorThemesDesc: 10 built-in palettes — Azure, Nord, Rosé, Dracula, Mono, and more — switch with one line.

cta.title: Clone. Install. Ship.
cta.desc: From zero to production-ready in under 2 minutes.

howItWorks.title: Up & Running in Minutes
howItWorks.desc: Three steps to your next project. No complex setup, no boilerplate fatigue.
howItWorks.cloneDesc: Grab the template with a single command. All themes, components, and configs included.
howItWorks.customizeDesc: Pick a theme, edit your content, tweak colors. Everything is modular and well-documented.
howItWorks.deployDesc: Push to Cloudflare Pages, Vercel, or Netlify. Edge-ready out of the box.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.freeA: Yes! The core template is 100% free and MIT-licensed. Use it for personal or commercial projects without restrictions.
faq.commercialQ: Can I use this for client projects?
faq.commercialA: Absolutely. The MIT license allows commercial use, modification, and distribution. Build as many projects as you want.
faq.switchQ: How do I switch between themes?
faq.switchA: Each theme is a separate page route (e.g., /liquid, /glass, /neo). Color palettes switch with a single data-theme attribute change.
faq.reactQ: Do I need React or framework knowledge?
faq.reactA: No. This template uses Astro with zero client-side JavaScript by default. Just HTML, CSS, and Astro components — no React required.
faq.deployQ: How do I deploy to Cloudflare?
faq.deployA: Run npm run build, then deploy with Wrangler CLI or connect your GitHub repo to Cloudflare Pages for automatic deploys.

themeStack.title: Included Themes
themeStack.desc: Six stunning, professionally designed themes included in one package. Switch instantly.
